channel.title: Mac help! please i need help i have a question about running a server
channel.description:
hey guys well i am on my mac and i am trying to run the source of godzhell reborn it is my fav source ever but it won't run the run.bat say :@echo off title Godzhell Reborn COLOR 0A java -Xmx512m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server
how do i change that so i can run it on my mac? thank you!

item.title: Mac help! please i need help i have a question about running a server
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Make it a .sh file.

Take your mac throw it on the ground run over it with your car then go buy a windows pc just make sure it doesnt have the shit windows 8 os.

item.title: Mac help! please i need help i have a question about running a server
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Osx doesnt work with run.bat you should execute the code through your terminal or get an IDE to run it with.
